attributes.action: allow members of the armed forces to be removed from paying tax on their salary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: members of the Army, RAF and RN are everyday risking their lives in the face of danger and destruction to help and support the way of life in the UK. I believe because of the recent support the armed forces has shown in the confict in Iraq and Afganistan they should be ellagible for a tax free wage as a thankyou from this country for making it safe. If you have read the recent tabloids you will see the poor conditions some have to stay in and thats in the UK! Our boys should be getting treated better and this is just an idea of repaying the huge debt we owe to them.
